__e: Now Bismarck is almost there and the unification of the German states ... is no longer to get around.
When King George discovers that the union of the kingdoms has been ruined, he will come after you.
Dear heavenly father, our hearts are filled with great happiness for the union of Randall and Jeannie...
What do humans call it when a man and women are joined?
You are my hope, my dream for a better world, a union between night and day, balancing the forces of good and evil.
It seems to me, on my side of the canyon, that the search for unity with another is the font of much of the world's unhappiness.
This is what it means... to be one with the universe.
We can't unite with others until we've first learned to unite amongst ourselves.
